MVN_GSE_CMNBLK_PKT_HANDLER

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Handle various type of common block packets
 executes appropriate decommutator given a generic common block packet

(See projects/maven/DPU/mvn_gse_cmnblk_pkt_handler.pro)

MVN_PFP_L0_FILE_READ

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
 $LastChangedBy: ali $
 $LastChangedDate: 2021-05-30 19:45:35 -0700 (Sun, 30 May 2021) $
 $LastChangedRevision: 30010 $
 $URL: svn+ssh://thmsvn@ambrosia.ssl.berkeley.edu/repos/spdsoft/trunk/projects/maven/DPU/mvn_pfp_l0_file_read.pro $

 Procedure: MVN_PFP_L0_FILE_READ   Routine for reading MAVEN L0 files
 Inputs (all optional)
 PATHNAME =   i.e. 'maven/dpu/prelaunch/ATLO/201?????_??????_atlo_l0.dat'   ; default
 FILE= 'filename'      ; full
 SOURCE=  structure similar to that produced by mvn_file_source()

(See projects/maven/DPU/mvn_pfp_l0_file_read.pro)
